detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and chest pocket. Short sleeves and short legs, both with sewn-in turn-ups, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Short top in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an overlocked edge at the hem.
Matt tights with an elasticated waist. 20 denier.
Long-sleeved top in patterned viscose jersey with a gently rounded hem.
Bucket hat in supersoft faux fur with a quilted, lightly padded lining and a double-layered brim. Width of brim 8 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, a narrow trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Sleeveless, calf-length jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a round neckline and decorative gathers at the front. V-neck at the back with a wrapover and concealed press-stud. Side pockets, and a gathered seam at the waist with concealed elastication and detachable tie belt.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a collar, V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Mittens in soft leather with covered elastication at the cuffs. Fine-knit lining in a cashmere blend.
Short T-shirt dress in soft viscose jersey.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with full feet and wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, adjustable straps and a visible zip at one side. Chest pocket, coin pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Slim, ankle-length legs.
Pyjamas in a printed cotton blend. Short-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Hair elastics without metal clips for a more comfortable grip.
Elasticated, fabric-covered scrunchies.

Suit trousers in a slub-weave cotton blend with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Straight-cut dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Lace underwired bra with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Tasselled ties at the waist and a gathered seam at the hem. Unlined.
Metal earrings with round discs and hoop pendants. Length 5 cm.

Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist, zipped side pockets and reflective details. Tapered legs with mesh stripes down the sides in a contrasting colour and a zip at the hems.
Fine-knit over-the-knee socks.
Boots in imitation patent leather with lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Chunky soles. Heel 2 cm.
Fitted Henley top in soft cotton jersey with a low-cut neckline, button placket and long sleeves.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, short, wide sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups.
Padded ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reinforced palms, ribbed cuffs and a reflective detail on the uppers. Thinsulate™ lining.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a lined gusset, high waist with a laser-cut edge, and wide lace trims at the hems. Light shaping effect on the waist, hips and bum.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey. Tops with short sleeves and a press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 1-4Y). Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Round metal earrings with a suspended hoop decorated with sparkly stones. Length 7.5 cm. Diameter 4 cm.
Loose-knit jumper in tape yarn with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with appliqués on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted blouse in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with a small stand-up collar, covered buttons at the back of the neck and an opening at the back. Voluminous, lined, raglan sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a polo neck. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back.

Top in a cotton weave with a round neckline and small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, a seam at the waist and a wide peplum. Longer at the back.

Shirt in premium cotton with a cutaway collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Varying pattern on the inside of the cuffs and collar stand. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Top in soft, printed fleece with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Block-coloured hat in soft, rib-knit cotton with an appliqué on the turned-up edge.

Top and cardigan in soft cotton. Short-sleeved top in jersey with a rounded lace collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Fine-knit cardigan with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a round neck, print motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
Bras in microfibre and mesh with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Set with a cotton shirt and trousers. Long-sleeved shirt in cotton poplin with a detachable bow-tie. Velvet trousers with detachable braces, an adjustable elasticated waist, side pockets and a fly with a press-stud.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey. Racer back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck and crossover shoulder straps with an open section at the back. Rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in an organic cotton weave with buttons at the back. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs, and a seam at the hem with a gently flared flounce.

Set with a top and trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front, short dolman sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook, disk and imitation leather pendant in the shape of a padded rose. Length 15 cm. Diameter of rose 8 cm.
Pull-on trousers in narrow-wale corduroy with a ribbed waistband, fake fly with a button at the front, fake front pockets and open back pockets.

Short jacket in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs, side pockets with a press-stud, and a drawstring hem. Jersey lining.
Calf-length lace dress with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam and concealed zip at the waist, and a flared skirt. Lined.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Metal earrings with fabric fringes.
Soft viscose jersey T-shirt in a slightly wider style with a V-neck.
Short dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Narrow, detachable belt at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Printed satin dance shoes with appliqués, elastication around the openings and elastic straps at the top. Fabric linings and insoles and soft suede soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and contrasting colour double sleeves.

Short-sleeved shirt in a linen and cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short vest top in soft viscose jersey with a decorative knot detail at the hem.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed viscose jersey with a small stand-up collar.
Scarf in a soft weave with a lightly brushed finish and fringe trims along the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cargo trousers in a linen and cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap welt back pockets and flap leg pockets.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with creases.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a lined, detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Elasticated drawstring at the waist, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
